sorular.soru: Above what exceeding of the speed limit in this situation, do you receive a Light Educational Measure Behaviour and Traffic (LEMG)?

feedback.metin: You will be required to follow the Light Educational Measure in Behaviour and Traffic (EMG), if you exceed the speed limit by more than 50 km/h or by more than 30 km/h in case of roadworks. In this situation there are roadworks. You must pay for this course yourself. If you do not take this course, your driving licence will be invalidated.

sorular.soru: It is 11 AM on a Wednesday. How fast can you drive here?

feedback.metin: A vehicle with a trailer is always allowed to drive at a speed of 90 km/h on the motorway unless the signs above or along the motorway show a lower speed. This is not the case here. This combination is therefore allowed to drive at a speed of 90 km/h.
